description.text:
(Translated from Chinese by AI)
1. Fixed the subtle offset caused by FPS text changes
2. Fixed the issue where empty renderer paths were incorrectly added to LD_LIBRARY_PATH
3. Fixed the issue where render plugins couldn't use custom EGL
4. New feature: The send button in the chat bar now follows changes in options.txt
5. Fixed the issue where renderer strings that were too long prevented renderer modification

（若启动器内下载缓慢请使用网盘下载,64位的请下载arm64，不知道该下哪个的请下载all）
1.修复fps文本变化导致细微偏移的问题
2.修复渲染器path为空时被错误添加进LD_LIBRARY_PATH的问题
3.修复渲染插件无法使用自定义egl的问题
4.新增功能：打开聊天栏发送键跟随options.txt变化
5.修复渲染器字符串长度过长导致无法修改渲染器的问题
